odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Ann Arbor Psurf Board Riding and Mountain Climbing Society : "Psurfs" : University of Michigan Law School, 1952-1953

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1. Aj luck√§, mavourne'en, I wish I were -- 2. Bandolero, Kentucky babe -- 3. Jerusalem mornin' -- 4. The way you roll your eyes, shall I wasting, away to Rio -- 5. George Jones -- 6. Oh Joe, graceful and easy, see you some Tuesday.

archdesc.bioghist: The Ann Arbor Surf-Board-Riding-Climbing Society, or Psurfs, was an organization of the University of Michigan law students who performed songs at various social events around campus. The P prefixing their name stood for "Pseudo."
archdesc.scopecontent: Recordings of songs performed by the Ann Arbor Surf-Board-Riding-Climbing Society, or Psurfs.

corpname.primary_name: Ann Arbor Psurf Board Riding and Mountain Climbing Society
